message: is it illegal to use TOR in Egypt ?!

data.message: Just using TOR to browse normally is legal, using it to deep web is illegal.
Using tor and tor browser is legal, but using it to do illegal things is illegal
it is illegal to use ANY kind of encryption in Egypt (although most of governments websites does have ssl certs.)

In current law there is no mention to using Tor or VPN services but  they declare that its illegal to encrypt your connection.

In the new law using Tor , vpn and proxies is totally illegal.
Firstly, if you tink you are being discrete, you are beingthe opposite of that.
Secondly, if you wanna act out the movie hackers, you ask people on irc not on Egyptian Geeks on Facebook :)
Thirdly, judging from your questions, I would learn the science behind the tools first and use it as an opportunity to learn about computer security and encryption and how the web works.

Finally, even if you are tempted, doing something illegal while come back and bite you, you never know if your browser, even tor, doesn't have a back door, and I am sure you won't know how sophisticated the people who can watch you are, until it is too late. So, don't play with fire to inflate your ego my friend, just a word of wisdom.

I'm just telling you, in the world of computer security, don't assume no one is watching you or that you are browsing privately until you understand how things work, otherwise it is you who are making dangerous assumptions,

بدون الخوض فى مناقشات علمية و استخدام جمل انجليزية مجعلصة انا بستخدم TOR بقالى حوالى 3 سنين و متسجنتش 
END OF TEXT :D

about the privacy tor gives you, once read that: no one will know what you really do when you're using tor. but consider everyone in egypt using normal plain text connections or even https and then your TOR traffic appears between those, then TOR will bring more eyes towards you than hiding your identity.
القانون المصري بيمنع اي اتصالات مشفرة يعني الgmail نفسه مش ليجل اصلا علشان بيستخدم https ف روق كده وكبر دماغك ;)
